name: Discord Nitro (Full)
description: Unlock the full Discord Nitro experience with Boost — available as trial or full versions.
long_description: Enjoy the complete features of Discord Nitro with Boost. Choose between a trial or full-length subscription. Fast delivery and easy setup guaranteed.
requirements:
1. Your Discord account must be at least 1 month old.
2. If selecting a trial, you must not have used Discord Nitro before and must have a working payment method.

name: Discord Nitro (Basic)
description: Get the full version of Discord Nitro at an affordable price for eligible accounts.
long_description: If your Discord account has never used Nitro, you can get the full version at the lowest rate. Ideal for first-time Nitro users.
requirements:
1. Your Discord account must be at least 1 month old.
2. You must not have previously activated Discord Nitro.

name: Surfshark VPN
description: Secure your online activity with Surfshark VPN at an affordable price.
long_description: Browse the web securely and privately with Surfshark VPN. Get it at a discounted rate with fast delivery and easy setup. Supports unlimited devices.
requirements: 1. If you are buying trial, it can only be activated once and requires a card.

name: ChatGPT Invite
description: Get a ChatGPT workspace invite for premium plan access — GPT-4, image generation, and advanced tools.
long_description:
Get invited to a ChatGPT workspace with premium access. Includes GPT-4, GPT-4o, DALL·E image generation, code interpreter, and all premium features depending on the workspace plan.

There is no warranty. It can work for an hour, a day, a week, or months — may expire fast. Don't come for refund or replacement even after reading this, it's not my issue. If you want with full warranty please buy from the official source, not from here.

name: Claude AI Invite
description: Get a Claude AI workspace invite for Pro or Team plan access — all Claude models and premium features.
long_description:
Get invited to a Claude AI workspace with premium access. Includes all Claude models (Sonnet, Opus, Haiku), file uploads, image analysis, code generation, and all premium features.

There is no warranty. It can work for an hour, a day, a week, or months — may expire fast. Don't come for refund or replacement even after reading this, it's not my issue. If you want with full warranty please buy from the official source, not from here.

name: Claude AI Gift
description: Redeem Claude AI Pro or Max gift codes — available individually or in bulk at discounted rates.
long_description:
Get Claude AI gift codes for Pro or Max plans. Redeem them on your own account for instant plan activation. Bulk pricing available for resellers and heavy users.

I'm new to this gift related section so there won't be any type of warranty or guarantee. If you know about this then buy it, otherwise please don't buy.

For bulk buyers: I am not giving any replacement for already redeemed codes whether you are using yourself or reselling. But if I didn't see it as already redeemed and there is a genuine error, there is a chance of replacement — but you must report within 3 hours. After 3 hours no replacement for any reason.

If you are keeping codes in stock and they expire, I will not replace them. Gift expiration is not my problem.

If you think I'm not trusted and that I would resell the same gift link already sold to someone else, please don't even come to my DMs.
